title: ESP SoT Helper - New Hack for Sea of Thieves
text:
A very powerful cheat for the game Sea of Thieves is available for free download on this page. A versatile solution for many players who want to use the ESP feature with the possibility of customization It has all the well-known and unique features to display through textures: players, items, islands, treasures, ships, and more.
For example, the first time you run this hack on SoT, you will be able to enable the following features:

All functionality is configurable through a convenient external menu, which you can explore and select the features you want. Activate all the features or just enable, for example, the display of enemy ships.
Update 2.53:
Added a pirate generator tab
Fixed some overlay bugs, that seemed to cause some of the overlays to not work at all
Update the "howtouse" text file with instructions for custom settings
How to open rar, zip, 7-Zip cheat?
How to open .DLL cheat?
creator: Caldor
